title: Delete All Stashes
description: In Git, stashes are used to temporarily save changes that are not yet ready to be committed. However, sometimes you may want to delete all stashes to start fresh. In this challenge, you will learn how to delete all stashes in a Git repository.

meta.title: Delete All Stashes in Git
meta.description: Learn how to delete all stashes in a Git repository and start fresh with this comprehensive guide.
meta.keywords: git repository, version control, git labs, stash, delete stash, git, git playground

verify.name: Verify that all have been deleted
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 删除所有贮藏
i18n.description: 在Git中，贮藏用于临时保存尚未准备好提交的更改。然而，有时你可能想要删除所有贮藏以重新开始。在这个挑战中，你将学习如何在Git仓库中删除所有贮藏。

meta.title: 在Git中删除所有贮藏
meta.description: 通过本全面指南，学习如何在Git仓库中删除所有贮藏并重新开始。
meta.keywords: Git仓库、版本控制、Git实验室、贮藏、删除贮藏、Git、Git游乐场

verify.name: 验证所有贮藏已被删除
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
